transcript: Then he was again led somewhere still blind- fold, and as they went along he was told alle- gories of the toils of his pilgrimage, of holy friendship, of the Eternal Architect of the uni- verse, and of the courage with which he should endure toils and dangers. During these wander- ings, Pierre noticed that he was spoken of now as the "Seeker," now as the "Sufferer," and now as the "Postulant," to the accompaniment of various knockings with mallets and swords.
